page.title: 17WILLIAM HENRY SMITH SCHOOL
page.content: People who go to the Wm Henry Smith school sleep there every night. When they go there they sleep in four bed dormitories. They are all single beds. The staff check on them each hour, to see if they are asleep,when they first go there. When they get older, they get more pocket money and they can sleep in a dormitory with fewer beds. When they go to bed they have a bookshelf so they can read for half an hour. When they go to the hostel, that means when they get older,they have to look after themselves and make their own meals every day. They get smaller dormitories when they get older and get into the hostels. They can go home every weekend and see their families. There is a flat above, because the boys can still be naughty. A member of staff lives in the flat.
